abstract: Alonzo Knowles, Bahamian man who hacked into celebrity email accounts and tried to sell television scripts and personal information he obtained, is sentenced to five years in prison.
lead_paragraph: Alonzo Knowles, 24, stole unreleased music and movie and television scripts, as well as nude images, and tried to sell them for thousands of dollars.
snippet: Alonzo Knowles, 24, stole unreleased music and movie and television scripts, as well as nude images, and tried to sell them for thousands of dollars....

headline.main: Man Who Hacked Celebrities’ Email Accounts Gets 5 Years in Prison
headline.print_headline: Hacker Who Broke Into Celebrities’ Email Accounts Gets 5 Years in Prison
